name: Project BHOST
description:
This game was my first VR project with the only objective to learn about programming VR games. This demo it's a college project and was made in June 2021. You can check my other projects here

Credits
  • All the SFX  was edited by me, but the originals fonts were from OpenGameArt and FreeSound.
  • Enemy 3D model: Sofía de Vega Giménez.
  • Assets: Generic Unity3D tools.
